description: Visualisation of Data from John Hopkins University of the Covid-19 Outbreak

targets.query: Select last(confirmed) as time, time as timestamp from covid19
SELECT sum("confirmed") AS "Confirmed" FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$States$/ AND "county" =~ /^$County$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "geohash", "location" fill(none)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

Doesnt filter as Population of world hard coded

Future Improvement to Store Country Populations

targets.query: SELECT sum("confirmed")/sum("population") FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$States$/ AND "county" =~ /^$County$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.
These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

targets.query: SELECT sum("deaths")/sum("population") AS "Death Rate" FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$States$/ AND "county" =~ /^$County$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

targets.query: SELECT sum("population") AS "Population" FROM "covid19" WHERE ("state" =~ /^$States$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

targets.query: SELECT sum("population") AS "US Population" FROM "covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES with KEY=county  WHERE "state" =~ /^$States$/
list.name: County
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES with KEY=county  WHERE "state" =~ /^$States$/

title: Covid-19 US - States
